channel.title: Auto-aim config not persistent
channel.description:
I can disable auto-aim within the game preferences, but when I reload the game, it has always returned to on.
All other settings persist as they should.

item.title: Auto-aim config not persistent
item.dc:creator: Chris1
item.description:
Yep Ive found as well, I have posted a thread 4 down from this entitled
config.cfg file settings not holding (auto aim)

Read full topic
